ca.ualberta.ishelf.Models

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.ishelf.Models.Notification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Notification>

    public class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Notification>
    The Notification is used to store all the information relevent to a single notification. This object is stored in firebase, and is how user's communicate when books have been requested, when requests have been accepted or declined, when a location has been set for a meeting, etc. Notification acts as a kind of conduit between Android Studios' notifications (the pop-ups that you can get outside) and how firebase interacts with notifications, and how we wanted to store them

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(Notification o)
      Set the comparitor for the sorting of notifications Notifications are sorted in order of date created, aka Older notifications are sorted in front of Newer notifications This is reversed when they are displayed

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Notification o)
        Set the comparitor for the sorting of notifications Notifications are sorted in order of date created, aka Older notifications are sorted in front of Newer notifications This is reversed when they are displayed
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Notification>
        Parameters:
        o - the notification object to compare
        Returns:
        int 0 when equal, 1 when greater than, -1 when less than
